Hi all

I've very happy to see that our paper about the evolution of modularity
generates a lot of very interesting comments. Jeff is always faster than
me to answer them and I often agree with him, therefore I didn't have a
lot of opportunity to add my grain of salt... yet.

We've posted our paper on slashdot:
http://slashdot.org/recent

If you have an account, we would be grateful if you help us to bootstrap
the slashdot process by voting for the story. Hopefully this will increase
the general awareness of simulated evolution and evolving neural networks!
Thanks very much if you help out.

Best regards,
-- JBM
